data.name: Edward Cullen
data.description: Current vampire from Forks USA. The key to defeating him is <insert key here>.

data.name: Geralt Rivia
data.description: Resolute man with striking white hair, who is bound by his own code of honor: <insert key here>.

data.name: John Lee
data.description: His favourite drink is osmanthus wine, and he loves to share with his friends. He even gave it a nickname of <insert key here>.

data.name: Sam Oak
data.description: Used to work in Pallet town and has his own lab. Gives junior trainer the choice between Bulbasaur, Charmander, or <insert key here>.

data.name: J. Robert Oppenheimer
data.description: 'Now I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds.' He has hidden the nuclear launch code using <insert key here>.
